data.message: Hookify PreToolUse/PostToolUse hooks can cause hangs for MCP tools when rule loading or evaluation takes too long. The fix is to add a fast-path early exit for MCP tools (tool_name.startswith('mcp__')) since hookify rules only target 'bash' and 'file' events - MCP tools have their own permission system. Location: ~/.claude/plugins/cache/claude-plugins-official/hookify/*/hooks/pretooluse.py and posttooluse.py
